Sentence.value: - The rectum may end in a pouch that does not connect with the colon.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - The [[rectum|C0034896]] may end in a pouch that does not connect with the [[colon|C0009368]].

Sentence.value: Many forms of imperforate anus occur with other birth defects.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Many forms of [[imperforate anus|C0003466]] occur with other [[birth defects|C0000768]].

Sentence.value: If the rectum connects with other organs, these organs will also need to be repaired.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If the [[rectum|C0034896]] connects with other [[organs|C0178784]], these organs will also need to be repaired.

Sentence.value: Call your provider if a child treated for imperforate anus has abdominal pain or fails to develop any bowel control by the age of 3.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Call your [[provider|C1441436]] if a child treated for [[imperforate anus|C0003466]] has abdominal pain or fails to develop any bowel control by the age of 3.
